Name: Cave Raider
About the game: A young Raider, through caves and abandoned castles, finds himself in an abandoned place, where he stumbles upon the resurrected dead, wandering ghosts and otherworldly games imprisoned in objects! Cave Raider - A top-down game where the player controls the character, dodging the walking dead, collecting the wandering souls of girls and playing otherworldly games to get further. Game Features: - Mini Games - Beautiful Decoration - Difficulty
